q: Simon Cowell has made no secret of the fact that he was underwhelmed by what Dublin had to offer- and it is believed to be under his orders that X Factor has axed the Irish leg. There is only so many places we can go on the audition trail, an insider revealed. "We went to Dublin last year but we haven't been to Liverpool so we thought we should do that this year." Some engineers seem to be drawn by the work at a smaller company, which offers an opportunity to reshape culture with less corporate bureaucracy and more creative freedom. Facebook has become the cool kid on the block, and now Google wants to prove it can still be cool, too, says Danny Sullivan , who follows both companies closely as editor-in-chief of Search Engine Land.
